About HIMS Degree College

Founded in 1995, HIMS Degree College has been at the forefront of academic innovation and excellence. Our mission is to provide world-class education that empowers students to become leaders in their chosen fields.

We believe in fostering critical thinking, creativity, and character development. Our state-of-the-art facilities, experienced faculty, and industry partnerships ensure that our graduates are well-prepared for the challenges of tomorrow.

Our Academic Programs

Choose from our comprehensive range of 2-year foundation programs designed to prepare you for successful careers in medicine, engineering, and technology. Each program combines theoretical knowledge with practical experience.

FSC Pre-Medical

2 Years Program

Foundation course for medical studies with comprehensive biology, chemistry, and physics curriculum. Prepares students for medical school admission.

Key Subjects:

BiologyChemistryPhysicsEnglish

Career Paths:

Medical School, MBBs, Dentistry, Pharmacy, Nursing

Available Seats: 120

FSC Engineering

2 Years Program

Foundation course for engineering studies with mathematics, physics, and chemistry. Prepares students for various engineering disciplines.

Key Subjects:

MathematicsPhysicsChemistryEnglish

Career Paths:

Mechanical, Electrical, Civil, Computer Engineering

Available Seats: 150

ICS Computer Science

2 Years Program

Intermediate in Computer Science with programming, mathematics, and computer studies. Foundation for computer science and IT careers.

Key Subjects:

Computer ScienceMathematicsPhysicsEnglishStatistics

Career Paths:

Software Development, IT, Data Science, AI

Available Seats: 100
